title: FireTec Bulk Buy 2009 - Spa collection anyone?

posts.content: I can organise one if you guys like. Start a list of your name, and the version you require. And I'll do the rest.

ie like this

1. PJGoose69 - roof mount - chafe guard

1. PJGoose69 - roof mount - chafe guard
2.Wilson67- roof mount -chafe guard
3.Rusty Lee-roof mount-chafe gaurd (can it be mounted in either roof or on wheel arch or lay down on engine side panel)
The roof mounted ones can be mounted virtically. As can the floor mounted ones. But a floor mounted can't be mounted on the roof etc.

1. PJGoose69 - roof mount - chafe guard
2.Wilson67- roof mount -chafe guard
3.Rusty Lee-roof mount-chafe gaurd
4.Lambretta-Tom - roof mounted-foam-chafegaurd
jim i have a spare wheel well in my engine bay and was going to mount it side ways on there so what one would i need for that mate.

Rusty Lee wrote:
jim i have a spare wheel well in my engine bay and was going to mount it side ways on there so what one would i need for that mate.


Roof mounted, as the bottle will be in that position, its just the bracket will be at 90 degrees, so that's cool.

I'm going to try split this thread into a new one, and lock the old thread so anyone interested doesn't get confused with the 22 pages from last year.

I think that's worked. For reference, anyone looking for details of the systems can ask any queries, or look at all 22 pages of last years bulk buy is here viewtopic.php?f=4&t=38325

hi jim interested but when would you need payment ?
toby

Hi ya, sometime between now and towards the end of March, so I can get the order completed with Firetec so marked into one of their scheduled production runs, then they'll be shipped to me around the time I get back to the UK so I can check them off, ready for collection from mine, or from Vic Farm / AGM (assuming someone will sign me in... )

Sound alright?

vwjim wrote:
Hi ya, sometime between now and towards the end of March, so I can get the order completed with Firetec so marked into one of their scheduled production runs, then they'll be shipped to me around the time I get back to the UK so I can check them off, ready for collection from mine, or from Vic Farm / AGM (assuming someone will sign me in... )

Sound alright?


Reckon i'll sign you in if necessary

1. PJGoose69 - roof mount - chafe guard
2.Wilson67- roof mount -chafe guard
3.Rusty Lee-roof mount-chafe gaurd
4.Lambretta-Tom - roof mounted-foam-chafegaurd
5.Menace foam/chafe guard vertical/horizontal mounting. (collect vicky fram & ill sign you in )

will postage be ok?
What will the approx total be
cheers
